items.content_html: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.
items.title: teberzin/TavernCall:  The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.

items.content_html: A web-based Facial Emotion Detection app built with Django, DeepFace, OpenCV, and JavaScript. Detects human emotions like happy, sad, angry, surprise, and more — from uploaded images or live webcam capture. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for demos, learning, or integration.
items.title: nishantxcode/emotion-detection-app: A web-based Facial Emotion Detection app built with Django, DeepFace, OpenCV, and JavaScript. Detects human emotions like happy, sad, angry, surprise, and more — from uploaded images or live webcam capture. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for demos, learning, or integration.

items.content_html: ClassTrack is a lightweight scheduling tool that helps students and administrators manage class schedules without conflicts. Easily add new classes, detect time overlaps, and keep your timetable organized and clash-free.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
